Next, we need to determine if any explorations have been made on Mars to search for tumuli. NASA has sent several missions to Mars, including the Viking missions, Mars Pathfinder, Mars Exploration Rovers, and Mars Science Laboratory, among others. 

However, none of these missions have reported the discovery of a tumulus on Mars or any other evidence of burial mounds. Therefore, based on the available information and evidence, the answer to the question is (B) no, a tumulus has not been discovered on Mars.
